    说明
    class 
    beancontroller
    simple controller for bean directly access db
    class 
    captcha
    web api: /captcha
    provides web api to get the captcha image and verify which linked with sid (session key)

    f
     
    class 
    index
     
    class 
    menu
    web api： /menu
    used to get menu

    class 
    temp
    web api： /temp
    used to access temporary file which created by Temp
    class 
    user
    web api： /user
    used to login or logout, etc.
